name: Platformer-less Platformer
description:
• Use left and right arrow buttons to move left and right
  • Use up arrow to jump up
  • Use down arrow to play a heartbeat. It gets louder the closer you are to the objective
  • Use escape key to toggle visuals ( game is meant to be played with audio only but I added this to allow people to get a feel for the game if needed)

Goal is to get the objective that is randomly positioned in a 160*320 pixel area. The objective is relocated every time it is reached. There is no way to lose and no way to win but it's a nice demo of how a game can be designed without visuals
